rizalWorks.description: Links to official sources hosting Rizal's original works

items.title: Noli Me Tangere
items.subtitle: Original Spanish Edition
items.description: The original Spanish text of Rizal's first novel
items.sourceDescription: Free digital library with public domain texts

items.title: Noli Me Tangere
items.subtitle: Filipino Edition
items.description: The Filipino text of Rizal's first novel
items.sourceDescription: Free digital library with public domain texts

items.title: Noli Me Tangere
items.subtitle: English Translation
items.description: English translation of Rizal's first novel
items.sourceDescription: Free digital library with public domain texts

items.title: El Filibusterismo
items.subtitle: Original Spanish Edition
items.description: The original Spanish text of Rizal's second novel
items.sourceDescription: Free digital library with public domain texts

items.title: El Filibusterismo
items.subtitle: English Translation
items.description: English translation of Rizal's second novel
items.sourceDescription: Free digital library with public domain texts

items.title: Mi Último Adiós
items.subtitle: Original Spanish with English Translation
items.description: Rizal's farewell poem written before his execution
items.sourceDescription: Free digital library with public domain texts

items.title: Essays Collection
items.subtitle: The Indolence, Philippines a Century Hence, etc.
items.description: Compilation of Rizal's major essays and articles
items.sourceDescription: Complete works including essays like 'The Indolence of the Filipinos'

items.title: Jose Rizal Complete Works
items.subtitle: Comprehensive Collection on Open Library
items.description: Open Library's collection of 108 works by and about Jose Rizal

items.title: Republic Act 1425
items.subtitle: The Rizal Law - Full Text
items.description: Complete text of the law mandating Rizal courses

items.title: Jose Rizal Trial Documents
items.subtitle: Court Proceedings and Defense Statements
items.description: Historical documents from Rizal's military trial proceedings
items.source: National Historical Commission of the Philippines

items.title: National Library Rizal Collection
items.subtitle: Manuscripts and Historical Documents
items.description: National Library's comprehensive Rizal manuscript collection

studyGuides.description: Academic and educational materials from educational institutions

items.title: DepEd K to 12 Curriculum Guide
items.subtitle: Official Teaching Guidelines
items.description: Department of Education's official curriculum guide including Rizal studies

items.title: Academic Research Papers
items.subtitle: Peer-Reviewed Studies on Rizal
items.description: Collection of academic papers from Philippine universities

items.title: Filipinas Heritage Library Rizaliana
items.subtitle: Digital Collection of Rizal Works
items.description: Comprehensive digital collection of Rizal's works and related materials

items.title: Khan Academy Philippines History
items.subtitle: Interactive Learning Modules
items.description: Interactive lessons about Philippine history including Rizal

items.title: UP Diliman English Department
items.subtitle: Academic Programs and Resources
items.description: University of the Philippines Diliman's premier English department with Rizal studies
items.source: UP Diliman Department of English and Comparative Literature
items.sourceDescription: Premier English department in the Philippines

items.title: Encyclopedia Britannica: Philippines - Spanish Period
items.subtitle: Comprehensive Historical Overview
items.description: Scholarly encyclopedia entry covering Spanish colonial period with detailed analysis of Rizal's era

items.title: Oxford Research Encyclopedia: Colonial Contractions
items.subtitle: Making of Modern Philippines 1565-1946
items.description: Vicente Rafael's comprehensive analysis of colonial regimes and Philippine modernity
items.source: Oxford Research Encyclopedia of Asian History

museums.description: Virtual tours and digital collections from museums

items.title: Rizal Shrine Virtual Tour
items.subtitle: Calamba, Laguna
items.description: Virtual tour of Rizal's birthplace and family home
items.source: National Historical Commission of the Philippines

items.title: Fort Santiago Digital Exhibits
items.subtitle: Rizal's Final Days
items.description: Digital exhibits from Fort Santiago where Rizal was imprisoned

items.title: Dapitan Museum Collection
items.subtitle: Rizal's Exile Period
items.description: Museum collection from Rizal's exile in Dapitan
